name: Aviary Attorney
summary:
Play the role of Monsieur Jayjay Falcon, a bird of prey with a good heart and questionable lawyering expertise. Join him and his witty apprentice, Sparrowson, as the two take on clients, interview witnesses, collect evidence, and deliver justice to the guilty! 

Features: 
Authentic 19th century art and music. 
Engaging narrative with meaningful choices and branching paths. 
Dozens of places to be explored around Paris. 
An enormous cast of colorful characters. 
Four high-pressure cases to work through, with the potential for more in the future!
